bug.author: peterentwistle
bug.summary: Broken links in the Cascade Classifier tutorial
bug.description:
In the code section of the <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/trunk/db/d28/tutorial_cascade_classifier.html>Cascade Classifier tutorial</denchmark-link> the links to objectDetection.cpp and objectDetection2.cpp do not lead to the files in the repository. The links should point to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/objectDetection/objectDetection.cpp>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/objectDetection/objectDetection.cpp</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/objectDetection/objectDetection2.cpp>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/objectDetection/objectDetection2.cpp</denchmark-link>
Both links are broken in the master branch, but correct in the 2.4 branch.

comments.comment: i was working on this tutorial <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/7436>#7436</denchmark-link>
